gist.headline: New Language Unlocked
gist.blurb: LinguaSpark has been planted in the app garden. It uses AI to help you practice languages, so you can finally ask the bees where the best pollen is.
gist.summary: Added LinguaSpark to the community showcase, offering interactive language learning powered by AI generation.
gist.impact: Users can discover a new tool for practicing languages through interactive games and AI scenarios.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy study scene. The Bee mascot is wearing reading glasses, looking at a floating holographic book. The book emits symbols (letters from different alphabets). The Monitor Robot is there, displaying a 'Hello' in a speech bubble. The vibe is 'magical learning'.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing tiny reading glasses, hovering over a magical open book emitting glowing letters. A chunky robot nearby displays a pixel speech bubble. Lime green (#ecf874) and warm cream library background. Soft lighting, lo-fi study vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, pastel gradients.
